nodes.text: A lightsaber was created from the remnants of several broken Gungan energy shields. It was wielded by a Jedi Knight and was very rare.

Players on Clone Wars Adventures could obtain this item by going to JointheJedi.com and clicking on the Clone Wars Adventures icon. The lightsaber has a purple hilt and a purple lightsaber crystal with an additional Gungan crystal, which gives the blade a bubble effect.
